meanings: (토목) pulverization, grinding, (목제품을) 분쇄하다 smash to splinters, crush, (적을) annihilate, smash

vlive.korean: " LINA는 분쇄기에 넣은거 같아요." "LINA's T shirt looks like shredded in a paper shredder." 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : WANNA.B - 워너비 '긴장백배 복불복특집'
vlive.english: "LINA's T shirt looks like shredded in a paper shredder."

examples.korean: Police say they have smashed a major drugs ring. 발음듣기 경찰이 거대 마약단을 분쇄했다고 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Police say they have smashed a major drugs ring. 발음

examples.korean: This electric coffee mill is our top seller. 발음듣기 이 전기 커피 분쇄기가 저희 가게의 최고 판매품입니다. Neungyule
examples.english: This electric coffee mill is our top seller. 발음

examples.korean: Which documents will be shredded? 발음듣기 어떤 서류들이 분쇄될 것인가? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Which documents will be shredded? 발음

examples.korean: Both can crush up CD's and computer disks. 발음듣기 둘 다 CD와 컴퓨터 디스크도 분쇄할 수 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Both can crush up CD's and computer disks. 발음

examples.korean: I can grind some decaf beans in the coffee mill. 발음듣기 분쇄기에다 카페인 없는 알커피를 좀 갈면 되요. Neungyule
examples.english: I can grind some decaf beans in the coffee mill. 발음
